scripts.build:js: npm run js:prebuild && npm run js:traceur && npm run js:bundle && npm run js:uglify && npm run js:afterbuild
scripts.build:js:dev: npm run clean:js ; traceur --out js/app.js --source-maps file --modules inline -- es6/main.js
scripts.build:css: npm run css:prebuild && npm run css:sass && npm run css:normalize && npm run css:autoprefixer && npm run css:uglify && npm run css:afterbuild
scripts.build: npm run build:js ; npm run build:css ; npm run copyhtml ; npm run copyimg ; npm run copydocs
scripts.copyimg:folders: mkdir deploy/img ; mkdir deploy/img/gate ; mkdir deploy/img/gui ; mkdir deploy/img/io
scripts.copyimg:files: for f in img/*/*.svg ; do cp $f deploy/$f ; done
scripts.copyimg: npm run copyimg:folders ; npm run copyimg:files
scripts.deployfolder: if [ ! -d deploy ] ; then mkdir deploy ; fi
scripts.js:prebuild: npm run deployfolder ; npm run clean:js ; mkdir deploy/js ; mkdir deploy/js/temp
scripts.css:prebuild: npm run deployfolder ; npm run clean:css ; mkdir deploy/css ; mkdir deploy/css/temp
